txt.en: Rising into the Grey Mountains above the Greylin, Grálinvarth overlooks Elderslade and might prove a valuable foothold in the War of Three Peaks.\n\nYour mission is to secure Grálinvarth as a foothold for the Gabil'akkâ in Elderslade.
Rising into the Grey Mountains above the Greylin, the oft-contested Grálinvarth overlooks the Greylin and serves as a valuable foothold in Elderslade.
You have completed your mission.\n\nYou should talk to Ausma for your reward.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have reported that the Orkish presence at Grálinvarth has lessened. If we are able to seize the overlook in their absence, it might prove a valuable watch-post in the days to come.

'You are to travel to Grálinvarth and claim it for the Gabil'akkâ!'
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
Your mission is to secure Grálinvarth as a foothold for the Gabil'akkâ in Elderslade.\n\nYou should talk to Ausma and travel to Grálinvarth.

'I have heard word that Grálinvarth has been taken for the Gabil'akkâ. With our scouts on that overlook, the forces of Gundabad shall be at a great disadvantage!\n\n'You have done well, [placeholder].'
